function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Need for modification of existing guidelines and plans to incorporate participatory planning and intersectoral collaboration","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient dissemination of the empowerment approach to government organizational change at the management level","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Local adaptive capacity may not be sufficient to contain the spread of contagious diseases in diverse contexts.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited attempts to scale up local approaches for disease containment.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate link between research, policy, and action in
